name: The Wood Healer
description:
The forest is diseased. But there is hope... You are The Wood Healer and must save it! Destroy the infection and heal the undergrowth of a mighty tree.

This is a quite unfinished project because it was developed for a game jam and I only used half of the given time effectively  (< 7 days).

The Game Jam: (optional theme: "Heal")

My First Game Jam: Summer 2022

Hosted by ;ludowoods, Adrienne Lombardo, lysander · #MyFirstGameJam

===========================================================

Dev note: This is the first game i have ever published and the first game jam i have participated in. Comments and feedback are highly appreciated. <3

- miichii
